title: I'm so pissed off...
body: I bought someone $50 worth of rp because I thought he was my friend... then he just removed me 1 day after that.{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Welp, that happens with random strangers online.

You might be able to redeem your RP if you make a support ticket claiming it was stolen, but once they see that you went to your account and willingly gave the RP to him they'll just be thinking that you're doing it to get $100 worth of RP instead of just $50.

Best of luck in the future.
So do I make a support ticket?

Click the "Support" button up above, the "Submit a ticket" link right to the left of this message, or just click the following:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new
